Nuxt module for making generative and 3D artwork with canvas-sketch in JavaScript
Generative Art || Nuxt Canvas Sketch (three.js, tensorflow.js and gsap)

Generative Art is the idea realized as genetic code of artificial events, as construction of dynamic complex systems able to generate endless variations. This is also a nuxt-module (@luxdamore/nuxt-canvas-sketch) -
